title: Designing a Collaborative Professional Learning Community (PLC) to Enhance Teachers' AI Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in secondary science education
context.additional_context: Design of PBL activities optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments, emphasizing experience-sharing between urban and rural teachers.

learning_goals: AI-based educational tools can be utilized to restructure over 20% of science classes
Conduct collaborative processes within PLCs to share and provide feedback on AI applications at least three times
Select and implement at least five AI applications executable on smartphones in educational settings
Design and execute a science experiment data analysis process utilizing AI technology

resources: Regional AI Adoption Barriers Analysis Report
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
